description: The Irish government says it will preserve information, "not to put it beyond reach as has been reported".
title: Worry over plan to seal records of former Irish mother and baby homes
title_page: Worry over plan to seal records of former Irish mother and baby homes - BBC News
maintext: A controversial bill relating to the records of such homes is currently working its way through parliament with academics and campaigners complaining that the proposed legislation will block access to information about "disappeared relatives or babies who are buried in unmarked graves".
